TopicTitle: Putting kerbal on EVA while flying aircraft separates joints and no kerbal parachutes

Articles.Content: I was flying a rocket-powered plane (x-15 replica) when I ran out of fuel. I decided to bail and when Bill left the cockpit the joint between the part behind the cockpit separated from the ones behind. I also found out that kerbals don't have parachutes yet either.
Also the plane was going around 100 m/s
